item.description:
Take a break from your shopping and join members Renee and Trish who will be co-hosting a meet and greet at Stone's Public House located in downtown Ashland. We will meet on the Pub side, it's very quaint. Drinks, apps, burgers, whatever; very informal. Not sure if there will be music that night but I'm sure they'll have a roaring fire going.

For those of you not familiar with the story of Stone's Public House take a look at the following link to see who may be joining you. http://www.ghostvilla...

For directions or to view the menu whether you are coming just for drinks or dinner see the Stone's Public House website http://www.stonespubl...

Organizer: Renee
http://divorcesupport...

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Meet & Greet @ Stone's Public House
